source.kubeconfig:
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
  - cluster:
      certificate-authority-data: 
      server: https://172.16.10.11:6443
    name: local-k8s
contexts:
  - context:
      cluster: local-k8s
      namespace: dev
      user: admin
    name: local-k8s-tester
current-context: local-k8s-tester
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
  - name: admin
    user:
      client-certificate-data: 
      client-key-data:
